field.name: Logo contrast color
field.description: Logo font color for use on white/light backgrounds (Sticky + Mobile menu)

field.name: Logo contrast image
field.description: Optional logo image for use on white/light backgrounds (Sticky + Mobile menu)

field.name: Slogan / phone
field.description: Optional slogan or phonenumber

field.name: Mode
field.description: Fluid is full-width, boxed shows the background on the sides of the page

field.name: Site shadow
field.description: Only in use in boxed layout

field.name: Round corners
field.description: On images. Does not apply to images in ecommerce

field.name: Position
field.description: Specifies if the navigation items should be left or right aligned

field.name: Sticky
field.description: Specifies if the navigation will stick to the top when the page is scrolled

field.name: Show top tools
field.description: Show the little header line on top of the navigation bar.

field.name: Header Image
field.description:
Imagebanner for use on all pages.
Images for fluid width should be at least 1920px wide.

field.name: Show image on the frontpage
field.description: Disable this if you want to use a banner or an carousel on the frontpage.

field.name: Navbar UPPERCASE
field.description: Full capitals

field.name: Navbar background mode
field.description: For the header navigation (When the header is in Cover or Mobile mode, this primarily changes the sticky navigation)

field.name: Gradient percentage
field.description: Be gentle and keep it below 33

field.name: Address
field.description: Address shown in the footer

field.name: Phone
field.description: Phone number shown in the footer

field.name: Email
field.description: Contact email shown in the footer

field.name: Show site map
field.description: Recomended. Helps google indexing the site.

field.name: Facebook account url
field.description: The account will be used by the Facebook paragraph item-type.

field.name: Facebook comment admin
field.description: The Facebook profile id of the administrator. Gives the possibility to edit the comments given on the site.

field.name: Social icons in the footer
field.description: Add social icons + links for the footer. Remember to enable Social links in the footer.

field.name: External scripts
field.description:
Here you can paste scripts for use on the page. Analytics, AddThis etc.
Remember to insert the whole script, including the <script> tags!

field.name: Domain
field.description: Full name: http://domainname.com Used to link images in the newsletter.

field.name: Ecom enabled
field.description: Enable/disable ecom related components in the frontend (Cart, Customer center).

field.name: Product list default
field.description: This will be overwritten by a cookie when the user chooses different

field.name: Related products
field.description: Show list of up to 4 related products on the product page.

field.name: Customers also saw
field.description: Show list of up to 4 related products on the product page.

field.name: Products from category
field.description: Show list of up to 4 related products on the product page.

field.name: Your last seen products
field.description: Show list of up to 4 related products on the product page.
